dc_title_s: Geothermal Energy Power Plants: United States, 2015
dc_description_s: This point shapefile contains locations of existing geothermal energy plants in the United States. This layer is a part of a collection of GIS data containing renewable and electric energy information for the U.S., including data on transmission lines, power plants and electricity substations.This shapefile can be used to locate geothermal energy power plants in the United States.
